strIntroduction: What You'll Do ICONO presents a new tour based on a ghost guide book around Barcelona. The Ghost Walking Tour is a night visit around Sant Pere, Santa Caterina and la Ribera quarters, based on the book “Fantasmes de Barcelona” The tour tells the mysterious and hair-raising stories that have been taking place in those areas for decades. Exorcisms, witchcrafts, bewitched convents and records of phantom apparitions invade the streets of Barcelona. Participants will have the chance to discover those baffling phenomena in a funny and entertaining way. You can also do the tour with a private group, with an official guide exclusively for you. Prices from 172€. Ask us for further information! This is a bilingual tour: Spanish and English.
